name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Application Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and a strong focus on security-driven practices including **Bug Bounty**, **Burp Suite**, **OWASP**, **SAST**, and **DAST**. Expertise in developing robust, high-performing APIs and automation tools, utilizing technologies such as **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) along with cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. Proficient in CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **GitLabCI**, infrastructure as code with **Terraform** and **Helm**, and enhancing security measures through **SonarQube**, **Snyk**, and **WAF**. Strong problem-solving skills complemented by effective communication, demonstrated through contributions to impactful projects at industry leaders like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
